panels.visual: Visual: The Temple of Aspects - but WRONG. The four towers are DIM. Banners are TORN. Cold, unnatural MIST seeps from the doors. DARKNESS surrounds it. Location: Temple of Aspects (corrupted) Characters: (Temple exterior)
panels.dialogue: (Caption): "But the Temple... the Temple was under attack."
panels.prompt:

Scene: Visual: The Temple of Aspects - but WRONG. The four towers are DIM. Banners are TORN. Cold, unnatural MIST seeps from the doors. DARKNESS surrounds it. Location: Temple of Aspects (corrupted) Characters: (Temple exterior)

Style: Bold ink line art, vibrant colors, dynamic composition, sequential art style, graphic novel quality.

panels.visual: Visual: Starwind lands in the corrupted courtyard. The Elder stumbles out, looking older and weaker, face full of fear. Characters: Lightsword, Starwind, The Elder

characters.Lightsword: A GLOWING ETHEREAL FIGURE made entirely of soft golden-white light. NOT a lizard, NOT humanoid with defined features - pure luminous energy in vaguely humanoid shape. No visible face, just two bright points of warm light where eyes would be. The entire body GLOWS and PULSES with inner light. Wearing simple cream-colored ceremonial robes that the light shines through. Ethereal, mysterious, magical being of pure radiance.
